name: Crushed Lime Shave Cream
description:
A sumptuous, richly lathering artisan shave cream with a fresh, invigorating citrus scent. Occams Crushed Lime Shave Cream is hand-made using traditional techniques and the finest natural ingredients, and the tiniest dash of a nature-identical preservative to keep it fresh. One pot lasts up to six months. No parabens, formaldehyde, SLS, ALS, EDTA or synthetic fragrance oils. Ideal for sensitive skin Ingredients:
  • Stearic acid
  • Water
  • Glycerin
  • Coconut oil
  • Extra virgin olive oil
  • Potassium hydroxide
  • Sodium hydroxide
  • Castor oil
  • French green clay
  • Pure essential oils
  • Phenoxyethanol
  • Caprylyl glycol

name: 24mm Deluxe Silvertip Badger Shaving Brush
description: A deluxe handmade shaving brush with an expertly turned horn handle, and a generous 24mm knot composed of the finest silvertip badger hair bristles. Note: Our brushes are handmade from natural horn. While they're meticulously crafted, each has its own character and minute imperfections.

name: Occams Original Pre-Shave Soap
description:
A handmade cold-process soap, crafted using traditional techniques from the finest 100% natural ingredients.

Our pre-shave soaps are extremely rich in glycerin, and help to moisten and soften your beard in preparation for an effortless shave.

Occams Original Pre-Shave Soap features a subtle blend of spice and exotic citrus oils with warm, mildly earthy notes to it.

name: Crushed Lime Pre-Shave Soap
description:
A handmade cold-process soap, crafted using traditional techniques from the finest 100% natural ingredients.

Our crushed lime pre-shave soaps are extremely rich in glycerin, and help to moisten and soften your beard in preparation for an effortless shave.

Occams Crushed Lime Pre-Shave Soap has a fresh, invigorating lime scent.

name: Occams Shave Kit
description:
A brilliant gift idea - or a great way to take the plunge with some great quality shave gear. The Occams Shave Kit includes:
  • 1x Deluxe silvertip badger hair and horn shaving brush
  • 1x Occams Shave Cream of your choice
  • 1x Occams Pre-Shave Soap of your choice
